T02TD1680E:299a-1: badzra satva no pi ka / bod skad du /
T02TD1680E:299a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs //
T02TD1680E:299a-3: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1680E:299a-4: gang zhig phan mdzad skyob pa'i mgon //
T02TD1680E:299a-5: thams cad don kun ston mdzad cing //
T02TD1680E:299a-6: yang dag dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i mchog / rigs bdag sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1680E:299a-7: rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i cho ga dag / rab tu sbyangs pas grol gyur cing //
T02TD1680E:299a-8: de nas ye shes bzang po nyid //
T02TD1680E:299a-9: don mchog gsang ba bshad par bya //
T02TD1680E:299a-10: dam tshig 'khor lo rdzogs byas te //
T02TD1680E:299a-11: phyag rgya'i yan lag rnam sbyangs pas //
T02TD1680E:299a-12: dngos grub kun gyi cha shas dag / nye bar sbyor ba'i yul du 'gyur //
T02TD1680E:299a-13: sa phyogs mngon par dga' ba ru //
T02TD1680E:299a-14: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste //
T02TD1680E:299a-15: 'gro rnams kun dgrol bsam pa yis //
T02TD1680E:299a-16: khrus rnams cho ga bzhin du spyad //
T02TD1680E:299a-17: dus gsum phyogs cha'i bye brag gis //
T02TD1680E:299a-18: drug gi chos rnams rang bzhin med //
T02TD1680E:299a-19: der snang rtog pa'i cha bral zhing //
T02TD1680E:299a-20: 'byung tshogs khams rnams ma skyes pa'o //
T02TD1680E:299a-21: 'gro ba'i rigs rnams tha dad kyang //
T02TD1680E:299a-22: mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel pa'i rgyun //
T02TD1680E:299a-23: bya dang byed tshogs yul can nyid //
T02TD1680E:299a-24: kun brtags ye shes chen pos non //
T02TD1680E:299a-25: thugs rje snang ba 'od ldan pa'i //
T02TD1680E:299a-26: kun 'byung rin chen phung po'i tshogs //
T02TD1680E:299a-27: rab tu sbyar bas khyab mdzad cing //
T02TD1680E:299a-28: nye bar ston pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1680E:299a-29: thugs kyi sngags kyis gsal byas te //
T02TD1680E:299a-30: kun nas spro zhing bsdus pa'i mthus //
T02TD1680E:299a-31: rdo rje sa gzhi la brten pa'i ;
T02TD1680E:299a-32: / ra ba gur sogs mtshon char bcas //
T02TD1680E:299a-33: shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba las //
T02TD1680E:299a-34: thabs kyi phyag rgya rdzogs pa nyid //
T02TD1680E:299a-35: gnyen po'i ye shes stobs dang ldan //
T02TD1680E:299a-36: 'gro gnas nyon mongs rnam par dag / rigs mchog 'khor lo bzang po'i tshogs //
T02TD1680E:299a-37: kun nas bsdus pas brtan pa dag / rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid sku //
T02TD1680E:299a-39: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgeg dang bcas //
T02TD1680E:299a-40: rin chen rgyan sogs kun gyis spras //
T02TD1680E:299a-41: g-yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin //
T02TD1680E:299a-42: g-yon pa kha tv'am dril bu 'khrol //
T02TD1680E:299b-0: dbu rgyan rtse bran @299b lnga yis brgyan //
T02TD1680E:299b-1: byang chub sems kyi cha lugs kyis //
T02TD1680E:299b-3: stod smad na bzas rnam par bklubs //
T02TD1680E:299b-5: nyi zla gsal ba'i gdan dang bcas //
T02TD1680E:299b-6: mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1680E:299b-7: rigs kyi sprul pas kun don mdzad //
T02TD1680E:299b-8: gnas gsum yi ge'i mtshan ma las //
T02TD1680E:299b-9: spro bsdus rigs kyi sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1680E:299b-10: rang gi cha lugs phreng sngags bcas //
T02TD1680E:299b-11: thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' nyid //
T02TD1680E:299b-13: yang dag bskul pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD1680E:299b-14: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing //
T02TD1680E:299b-15: rigs lnga'i cod pan rnam par mdzes //
T02TD1680E:299b-16: dam tshig phyag rgya rdzogs pa las //
T02TD1680E:299b-17: ye shes byin brlabs brtan par gzhug / lha mo mchod pas mnyes byas te //
T02TD1680E:299b-18: shin tu gar bcas rol mo'i glus//
T02TD1680E:299b-19: rigs kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs dag / yang dag bstod cing gnas kun brgyan //
T02TD1680E:299b-20: thugs ka'i sngags kyi phreng ba las //
T02TD1680E:299b-21: sna lnga'i phreng ba spro zhing bsdu //
T02TD1680E:299b-22: aom badzra satva h'um h'um sv'a h'a //
T02TD1680E:299b-23: ji srid brtan par ma gyur par //
T02TD1680E:299b-25: stong pa ma yin mi stong min//
T02TD1680E:299b-26: dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med //
T02TD1680E:299b-27: shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor bas //
T02TD1680E:299b-28: thabs kyi snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams //
T02TD1680E:299b-29: de bas de nyid snying rje thabs //
T02TD1680E:299b-30: shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal //
T02TD1680E:299b-32: nyal dang langs sogs thams cad du //
T02TD1680E:299b-33: lha yi ting 'dzin brtan byas te //
T02TD1680E:299b-34: thams cad spyang zhing byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1680E:299b-35: bza' btung thams cad bdud rtsi'i tshogs //
T02TD1680E:299b-36: yul kun lha mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02TD1680E:299b-37: bskyed la phyag rgya'i 'khor lo yis //
T02TD1680E:299b-38: bya ba'i phrin las sna tshogs kun //
T02TD1680E:299b-40: dkyil 'khor mnyes pas mchod bya ste //
T02TD1680E:299b-41: dga' ba'i sbyin sreg tshim pa'i mchog / tshogs kyi 'khor lo brtul zhugs bzang //
T02TD1680E:299b-42: yi ge phyag rgya mtshan ma'i sku //
T02TD1680E:299b-43: rnam gsum mdzad pa sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1680E:299b-44: rtag tu gsang sngags sgra ldan pas //
T02TD1680E:300a-0: phyag rgya'i gnas kun mnyam sbyor @300a * //
T02TD1680E:300a-2: / thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
T02TD1680E:300a-3: dngos grub sna tshogs nye bar 'grub //
T02TD1680E:300a-4: phyag rgya gcig pa'i bsam gtan mchog / rigs kun yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02TD1680E:300a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' gsal byed pa'i //
T02TD1680E:300a-6: theg pa bla med dam pa'i mchog / yang dag sbyar ba'i tshul 'di yis //
T02TD1680E:300a-7: ma lus mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas te //
T02TD1680E:300a-8: dngos grub 'khrigs pa'i phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD1680E:300a-9: rigs mchog phrin las mthar phyin shog / rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po rgyal po aindra bh'u tis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
